courses.title: Introduction to Guitar Playing
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar playing, including chords, strumming techniques, and beginner songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced piano techniques, including arpeggios, scales, and improvisation.

courses.title: Music Theory Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, chords, and harmonic analysis.

courses.title: Drum Set Basics
courses.description: Learn how to play the drums with this beginner course, covering basic beats, fills, and techniques.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Develop your singing voice with this course, focusing on breath control, pitch, and vocal exercises.
